traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.description: While in sunlight, the shadow has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

actions.name: Draining Swipe
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the targetâ€™s Strength score decreases by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a Shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the shadow takes the Hide action.
